SELECT T1.PRE_ORD_ID , T1.REQST_DT , T1.CHNNL , T1.STUS_ID , T1.SOF_NO , T1.CUST_PO_NO , T1.APP_TYPE_ID , T1.SRV_PAC_ID , T1.INST_PRIOD , T1.CUST_ID , T1.EMP_CHK , T1.GST_CHK , T1.EURC_CUST_RGS_NO , T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID , T1.CUST_CNTC_ID , T1.KEYIN_BRNCH_ID , T1.INST_ADD_ID , T1.DSC_BRNCH_ID , TO_CHAR(T1.PRE_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS PRE_DT , TO_CHAR(T1.CRT_DT, 'mm') AS MONTH , EXTRACT(YEAR FROM T1.CRT_DT) AS YEAR , T1.PRE_TM
, REPLACE(REPLACE(T1.INSTCT, CHR(10), '\n'), CHR(39), CHR(38)||CHR(35)||'39;') AS INSTCT , T1.EX_TRADE , T1.ITM_STK_ID , T1.CPNT_ID , T1.PROMO_ID , T1.MTH_RENT_AMT , T1.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD_TP , T1.PROMO_DISC_PERIOD , T1.TOT_AMT , T1.NOR_AMT , T1.NOR_RNT_FEE , T1.DISC_RNT_FEE , T1.TOT_PV , T1.TOT_PV_GST , T1.PRC_ID , T1.MEM_CODE , T1.ADV_BILL , T1.CUST_CRC_ID , T1.BANK_ID , T1.CUST_ACC_ID , T1.IS_3RD_PARTY , T1.RENT_PAY_CUST_ID , T1.RENT_PAY_MODE_ID , T1.CUST_BILL_ID , T1.CUST_BILL_CUST_ID , T1.CUST_BILL_CNT_ID , T1.CUST_BILL_ADD_ID , T1.CUST_BILL_REM , T1.CUST_BILL_EMAIL , T1.CUST_BILL_IS_SMS , T1.CUST_BILL_IS_POST , T1.CUST_BILL_EMAIL_ADD , T1.CUST_BILL_IS_WEB_PORTAL , T1.CUST_BILL_WEB_PORTAL_URL , T1.CUST_BILL_IS_SMS2 , T1.CUST_BILL_CUST_CARE_CNT_ID , T1.REM1 , T1.REM2 , T1.CRT_USER_ID , T1.CRT_DT , T1.UPD_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(T1.UPD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') UPD_DT , T1.CORP_CUST_TYPE , T1.AGREEMENT_TYPE , T1.SALES_ORD_ID_OLD , T1.RELATED_NO , T2.STK_CTGRY_ID , (SELECT sys3.IND FROM SYS0026M SYS1, SYS0013M SYS2,SYS0094M SYS3 WHERE SYS1.STK_CTGRY_ID = SYS2.CODE_ID AND sys2.cODE_MASTER_ID = 11 AND SYS2.CODE = SYS3.CODE(+) AND SYS1.STK_id = T3.ITM_STK_ID) BUS_TYPE , T1.EX_TRADE_PR IS_EXTRADE_PR , T1.VOUCHER_CODE FROM SAL0213M T1 JOIN SYS0026M T2 ON T2.STK_ID = T1.ITM_STK_ID LEFT JOIN ( select a.sales_ord_id,b.ITM_STK_ID from sal0001d a left join sal0002d b on b.sales_ord_id = a.sales_ord_id-- where a.sales_ord_id = T1.sales_ord_id_old ) T3 on t1.sales_ord_id_old = t3.sales_ord_id WHERE T1.PRE_ORD_ID = #{preOrdId}

SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM SAL0213M WHERE SOF_NO = #{sofNo} AND STUS_ID NOT IN (10, 98) AND '1' = #{selType} UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM SAL0001D WHERE REF_NO = #{sofNo} AND STUS_CODE_ID != 8 AND ('1' = #{selType} OR '2' = #{selType}) )

SELECT T2.NAME AS STUS , REM1 , REM2 , T3.USER_NAME AS CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT ,CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'HH12') < 12 THEN TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'HH12:MI AM') ELSE TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'HH12:MI PM') END AS CRT_TIME from SAL0302D T1 join sys0038m T2 on T1.STUS_ID = T2.STUS_CODE_ID join sys0047m T3 on T1.CRT_USER_ID = T3.USER_ID where PRE_ORD_ID = #{preOrdId} ORDER BY CRT_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ORG0001D WHERE STUS = 1 AND SUBSTR(REPLACE(NRIC,'-',''), 0, 12) = #{nric}

SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_SUB_PATH ,T2.PHYSICL_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_EXTSN ,T2.FILE_SIZE ,T2.FILE_KEY_SEQ FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId} ORDER BY T2.FILE_KEY_SEQ
SELECT * FROM (SELECT CODE IND , CODE_NAME DAY FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND ='EXTRADE' ) PIVOT (MAX(DAY) FOR IND IN ('startDate' AS start_Date, 'endDate' AS end_Date))
SELECT VOUCHER_CODE FROM SAL0213M WHERE WHERE PRE_ORD_ID = #{preOrdId}
